definition:
A [*Borel isomorphism*]{} between two Borel spaces $(X; \mathbb{B}(X))$
and $(Y; \mathbb{B}(Y))$ is defined as the [*bijection*]{}
$\iota: (X; \mathbb{B}(X)) \cong (Y; \mathbb{B}(Y))$.

[9]{}

M.R. Buneci. 2006., , [*Surveys in Mathematics and its Applications*]{},
Volume 1: 71–98.

A. Connes.1979. Sur la théorie noncommutative de l’ integration,
[*Lecture Notes in Math.*]{}, Springer-Verlag, Berlin, [**725**]{}:
19-14.
